snippet: Decades ago, Arthur Lampitt of Granite City, Ill., smashed his 1963 Thunderbird into a truck. On Wednesday, during surgery, a 7-inch turn signal lever from that T-Bird was removed from his arm.
lead_paragraph: Decades ago, Arthur Lampitt of Granite City, Ill., smashed his 1963 Thunderbird into a truck. On Wednesday, during surgery, a 7-inch turn signal lever from that T-Bird was removed from his arm.

headline.main: Missouri: Blinker in Arm Finally Signals Pain
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Blinker In Arm Finally Signals Pain
